content: elegant wrist warmers right hand row 1 chain 35 double_crochet in 6th chain from hook ch1 double_crochet in same chain as last double_crochet skip 2 chain *v-st in next chain repeat from * to end skip 1 chain double_crochet in next chain chain 3 turn 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet row 2-3 v-st in each chain 1 space across double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 1 turn 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet row 4 single_crochet in next 8 sts chain 5 skip next 2 by julee a reeves chain 1 sps v-st in next 6 chain 1 sps double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 3 turn materials 6 v-sts 5 chain 8 single_crochet 2-3 ounces of simply soft h hook row 5 v- st in next 6 chain 1 sps skip next 2 sts *v-st in next st skip next 2 sts special stitches repeat from * across double_crochet in last st chain 3 turn v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in specified space 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet or stitch row 6-16 repeat row 2 fasten_off left hand row 1 chain 35 double_crochet in 6th chain from hook left and right wrist warmers ch1 double_crochet in same chain as last double_crochet *skip 2 leave 10 inch tail and sew 1st and last chain v-st in next chain repeat from * to end row together weave in ends and keep skip 1 chain double_crochet in next chain chain 3 turn those hands warm if you d like you can do 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet a shell edging on the cuffs row 2-3 v-st in each chain 1 space across double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 3 turn 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet row 4 v-st in next 6 v-sts chain 5 skip next 2 ch1 sps single_crochet in last 8 sts ch1 sps and double_crochet s chain 3 turn 6 v-sts 5 chain 8 single_crochet 1 double_crochet row 5 *skip next 2 sts v-st in next st repeat from * to end double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 10 v-sts 2 double_crochet row 6-16 repeat row 2 fasten_off
